product_name: REI  Quarter Dome T3 Plus Tent - Special Buy
long_description: Unlike cramped tents that sacrifice space for weight savings, the 3-person, 3-season REI Quarter Dome T3 Plus tent feels so roomy it's easy to forget it's a backpacking tent, not a luxury suite.
short_description: Unlike cramped tents that sacrifice space for weight savings, the 3-person, 3-season REI Quarter Dome T3 Plus tent feels so roomy it's easy to forget it's a backpacking tent, not a luxury suite.
